Add R Shiny dashboard for Seattle mayoral accountability

Implement complete dashboard tracking Mayor Wilson''s homelessness
commitments with 4 primary indices:
- Unsheltered population count with PIT data
- Emergency housing progress toward 4,000 units \(with locked units callout\)
- Homeless overdose deaths with rolling average
- Cost per person housed

Includes seed data \(2015-2025\), interactive Plotly charts,
methodology modals, mobile-responsive layout, and full documentation.
